Larry Page and Sergey are 10 years older than they were when they thoughtfully hired Eric Schmidt to be the CEO... so everybody's growing up, Vint Cerf said. Google has grown over the past decade from a start-up battling other Internet search engines into a technology giant with nearly 25,000 employees and annual revenue of nearly$ 30 billion. Russia is centrally important to global energy with nearly a fifth of the world's daily gas production and about 13 percent of today's oil production. So this initiative... is good news for Europe, for the UK's energy security and worldwide, British Energy Secretary Chris Huhne said on Friday.
